section.p: The Baroness listens with interest to your report. ‘It seems incredible that a race that was once feared for its martial prowess should now have sunk to such a debased level,’ she says. ‘It is an object lesson for us all.’
, and if the total is higher than your THIEVERY score then increase it by 1. Vanna also orders her seneschal to pay you out of the castle treasury.
